Text: You just made my day, HobbitFilmz! I read a review for V/H/S/2, so I decided to download the 1st movie. Watched it last night, and have been searching on Google for the 2nd (I couldn't get the search bar on TPB to find it), and finally found your upload less then a minute after it went online.
there are 2 english audio tracks, no idea why. the 2nd one seems to sound better and have less distortion, but it's quieter so boost the volume.

audio track 1 is English stereo 2.0, track 2 is English 5.1.
A:9, V: 9, proper copy, and a sequel much better than the first "VHS".
